## UIImage.setBuffer() method

设置图片raw data

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setBuffer( data : number, width : number, height : number, channel : number) : void ;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | number |  |
|  width | number | 内容的宽 |
|  height | number | 内容的高 |
|  channel | number | 3/4 代表RGB/RGBA |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
